Package model

Class Project

java.lang.Object
model.Project
public class Project extends Object
This class represents a Project. It contains the name of the project, the start date, end date, budget, the stages, the months per stage, and the managers.

    • Project

      public Project(String nameProject, Calendar startDateProject, Calendar endDateProject, double budget, int[] monthsStage, String greenSQAManagerName, String greenSQAManagerPhone, String companyManagerName, String companyManagerPhone)
      Constructor method for a Project object.
      Parameters:
      nameProject - Name of the project.
      startDateProject - Start date of the project.
      endDateProject - End date of the project.
      budget - Budget of the project.
      monthsStage - Array of integers representing the months for each stage.
      greenSQAManagerName - Name of the Green SQA Manager.
      greenSQAManagerPhone - Phone number of the Green SQA Manager.
      companyManagerName - Name of the Company Manager.
      companyManagerPhone - Phone number of the Company Manager.
